charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) Possession with Intent to Distribute and Distribution of Heroin(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to the custody of BOP for a term of 21 months. 3 years Supervised Release with standard/special conditions. $100 Special Assessment. Fine is waived.
